title: Nikolas Cruz Is Expected to Plead Guilty to 2018 Parkland School Shooting
sub_head: Cruz could still face death penalty for shooting that killed 17 students and staff members
body:
Attorneys for the former student accused of killing 17 students and staff members in the 2018 school shooting in Parkland, Fla., said he planned to change his plea, likely indicating he would plead guilty to murder charges.
At a hearing Friday, lawyer David Wheeler said, “It’s our intent to enter a change of plea as to both cases to all charges.”
